Class ListDisplayTagBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • BodyTagSupport
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.ListDisplayTagBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListDisplayTag, UnpagedListDisplayTag

    public class ListDisplayTagBase
extends BodyTagSupport
    Base class for ListDisplayTag implementation.
